triples.name: Robot navigation
triples.relevance: Navigation2 solves the mobile robot navigation problem for warehouses, retail stores, and sidewalk environments

triples.name: Behavior tree (artificial intelligence, robotics and control)
triples.relevance: Navigation2 employs behavior trees as a novel approach for navigator task orchestration

triples.name: Robot Operating System
triples.relevance: Navigation2 builds on ROS2, the successor to ROS Navigation which is the widely-adopted baseline system

triples.name: Obstacle avoidance
triples.relevance: Navigation2 enables robots to operate safely among pedestrians and dynamic environments

triples.name: Motion planning
triples.relevance: Path planning and navigation in dynamic environments is core to Navigation2 functionality

triples.name: Sensor fusion
triples.relevance: Navigation2 employs new methods designed for dynamic environments applicable to modern sensor data integration

triples.name: Mobile robot
triples.relevance: Navigation2 enables autonomous mobile robots to operate in real-world environments
